label: 11. What are the legal rights (under the state legal system) of the community to use the resources within the ICCA, excluding subsurface resources?

options.label: Full legal rights to all resources
Legal rights to all resources, within certain constraints (e.g. legal regulations/limitations)
De facto rights to all resources (full control of resources, although not in law)
Rights to only certain resources/ a set amount
Protection of resources only: no use allowed
Rights to commercial use of the resources
Other (please describe under the final question)
